name: Kick. Nausea. Repeat.
description:
Kick. Nausea. Repeat

In this difficult kick-em-up, you will have to juggle balls over a pit of nothingness.

Why are you even doing this? For fame? Who knows?

Contains

  • Simple controls.
  • Difficult gameplay that makes you want to play something else.
  • Kick your way to the top with Online Highscores.
  • One football related thing.
  • An option to turn off flashy colors so you don't die.

Other Stuff

You can download this game for free if you like, but if you have some spare change and enjoy the game, consider throwing it towards me.

This game is only available for Windows at the moment.

Follow me on twitter @DetectivePixel
